mapper.insert: insert into houserentdeal (aptCode, aptName, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, floor, area, rentTypeCode, rentTypeName, deposit, rentMoney, buildYear) values (#{aptCode}, #{aptName}, #{dealYear}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealDay},#{floor}, #{area}, #{rentTypeCode}, #{rentTypeName}, #{deposit}, #{rentMoney}, #{buildYear})
